info.title: LAPP - OpenAPI 3.0
info.description: Idk wtf im doing, but this is vibing

patch.description: Update an existing course by Id

404.description: Cannot find course created by you

get.summary: Get all of a course content

post.summary: Create content with specific course id

post.description: Add a new course to the list of courses

requestBody.description: Create a new pet in the store

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Indicate the number the list starting at, default 0

parameters.name: num
parameters.description: number of courses to return in a list, 0 to return all

get.summary: Get all participant of a course

post.summary: Lecturer add student to their course

404.description: Cannot find course created by you

delete.summary: Lecturer remove student from their course

get.summary: Get all of an exercise info

403.description: User not join course to see exercise

delete.summary: Lecturer delete their exercise by id

get.description: Get all grades of students in all exercises in the course

parameters.name: num
parameters.description: Number of students to return in a list (if 0 then return all)

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Indicate the number the list starting at, default 0

parameters.name: num
parameters.description: number of lecturers to return in a list, 0 to return all except the first

get.description: Redirect the user to the Google OAuth page for logging into their account

parameters.name: redirect_path
parameters.description: the path to redirect to after successful authentication (defaults to /)

404.example: Cannot find course created by you
